landing.description: A tool to connect your phone and your PC together.

device_connection.delete_device_confirmation: Are you sure to unpair this device?
device_connection.pair_hint: To pair a new device, go to Manage devices in your phone and select this device.

status.device_offline: This device is not reachable. Make sure to connect to the same network as this device!
status.device_unpaired: This device is unpaired! To pair this device, go to Manage devices in your phone and select this device.

messages.conversation_not_chosen: Choose a conversation or start a new conversation.
